title: Theresa May – 2019 Brexit Statement in the House of Commons
author: admin
summary: Below is the text of the statement made by Theresa May, the Prime Minister, in the House of Commons on 14 January 2019.

[![](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/theresamay-1.jpg)](https://www.ukpol.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/12/theresamay-1.jpg)
